text: The men's tournament in ice hockey at the 2019 Canada Winter Games was held in Red Deer, Alberta between February 16 and 22, 2019. Thirteen provinces and territories competed in the tournament, including Nunavut participating for the first time. ==Preliminary round== All times are local (UTC−7). ;Key: === Group A === {|
